Title: Nighthawks
Writer: David Shaber (screenplay by), David Shaber (story by), Paul Sylbert (story by)
Actors: Sylvester Stallone, Billy Dee Williams, Lindsay Wagner, Persis Khambatta
Plot: Deke DaSilva and Matthew Fox are two New York City cops who get transferred to an elite anti-terrorism squad. About this same time, an infamous international terrorist shows up in New York City looking to cause some chaos. It's up to DaSilva and Fox to stop him, but will they be in time...?
